#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Get a CKYC Number
#Text=A Central Know Your Customer ( CKYC ) number is required by law in India if you plan to invest in mutual funds or other financial assets .
#Text=Having a CKYC number will show financial regulators that you are a legitimate investor and help to verify your identity .
#Text=The process for getting a CKYC number is relatively easy and once you have it , you do not need to apply for it again .
#Text=With a few key personal documents and the right information on the application form , you can get your CKYC number and start investing right away .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Applying for a CKYC Number
#Text=Download and print the CKYC application form .
#Text=Access the application form here : https://www.sebi.gov.in/sebi_data/commondocs/KYC_ApplForm_p.pdf .
#Text=You can also get a copy of the form through your financial broker or mutual funds provider .
#Text=Provide basic personal information on the form .
#Text=You will need to provide your full name , as well as your father ’s or spouse 's full name .
#Text=You will also need to list your date of birth , your gender , your occupations , and your marital status .
#Text=You will also need to note your citizenship level and your residential status .
#Text=Include your Permanent Account Number .
#Text=Your PAN is a 10-digit number given to you by the federal Income Tax Department .
#Text=You can apply for a PAN if you do not already have one through the government ’s Income Tax Department .
#Text=Provide proof of identity and address information .

#Text=You will need to list at least 1 of the following for the proof of identity section and the proof of address section : your passport number and the expiry date , your driver ’s license number and the expiry date , your voter ID card number , or an AADHAR card number .
#Text=You will also need to provide copies of your passport or driver ’s license to prove your identity and address .
#Text=You may need to provide the originals of your passport and your driver ’s license , if requested during the application process .
#Text=Include a recent passport size photograph of yourself .
#Text=The photograph should be well-lit and standard passport size , which is in India .
#Text=You can get a passport photograph taken at a local photography studio or at a passport services kiosk .
#Text=Submit the completed form to your broker or mutual funds provider .
#Text=Sign the signature line on the form .
#Text=Then , bring the completed form , the passport size photograph , and a copy of your passport or driver ’s license to your financial representative .
#Text=They can then process your application properly .
#Text=You can also go to a local financial registrar office in your area to submit the application .
#Text=Provide a completed investment application form , if required by your broker .
#Text=Some financial representatives require you to also submit an investment application , where you specify which investments you would like to pursue once you receive your CKYC number .
#Text=This will help them to get a sense of how you plan to use your CKYC number and to analyze your finances in detail .
#Text=Ask your broker for an investment application form that you can complete .
#Text=Receiving and Using Your CKYC Number
#Text=Wait up to 2 weeks for your application to process .
#Text=You cannot pursue any investments legally until your application is approved .
#Text=However , you can discuss possible investments and mutual funds you are interested in with your financial broker or advisor while you wait .
#Text=Get your 14-digit CKYC number by email or text message .
#Text=Once your application is approved , you will receive an email or a text message that lists your CKYC number .
#Text=The message will appear as :
#Text=“ Your KYC details have been registered with Central KYC Registry .
#Text=Your CKYC identifier is 10088756711997 . ”
#Text=After you have saved the CKYC number in a safe place , delete the email or text message so your number cannot be stolen .
#Text=A stolen CKCY number can lead to identity fraud , as others can try to use your number to make investments .
#Text=Apply again if your application is rejected .
#Text=If your application is rejected , you may have failed to provide the proper documentation .
#Text=You can apply again for the number by filling out the application form again and following the proper guidelines .
#Text=Make sure you double check your documentation to ensure your application is approved .
#Text=You can also talk to your financial broker or advisor for guidance to ensure your application is approved on your second try .
#Text=Use your CKYC number to invest in mutual funds and other financial products .
#Text=Having a CKYC number will allow you to invest your money through a broker or a financial advisor .
#Text=Providing your CKYC number on financial applications and forms will streamline the process .
#Text=Quick Summary
